name: Toyland Task
description:
A short story set on a dreamlike island.

This was a small project as an excuse to get back into game design, and to experiment with voxels.

Soundtrack by First Kings, available here:

https://firstkings.bandcamp.com/album/toyland-task-soundtrack

Made with RPG in a Box, by Justin Arnold:

https://zeromatrix.itch.io/rpginabox
Additional assets by Justin and Sarah Arnold, plus more from this pack by Fonk:

https://funkyechoes.itch.io/project-deep-asset-collection-for-rpg-in-a-box
